books.description: A 13-year-old boy’s family moves from Japan to North Korea, where he spends 36 difficult years under the country’s regime. 5 hours, 54 minutes unabridged. Read by Brian Nishii.
books.title: A RIVER IN DARKNESS

books.author: David Spade
books.description: A memoir by the star of “Tommy Boy” and former cast member of “Saturday Night Live.” 6 hours, 12 minutes unabridged. Read by the author.
books.title: A POLAROID GUY IN A SNAPCHAT WORLD

books.author: Rick Wilson
books.description: The Republican campaign strategist gives his take on the current president and offers a way forward for conservatives. 9 hours, 25 minutes unabridged. Read by the author.
books.title: EVERYTHING TRUMP TOUCHES DIES

books.author: Anthony Bourdain
books.description: A memoir-exposé of the restaurant world. Originally published in 2000. 8 hours unabridged. Read by the author.
books.title: KITCHEN CONFIDENTIAL
